text: Great value for money! The cheeseburger was juicy and the fries were perfectly crispy. Exactly what I expected from a good diner.
Solid diner food. The pancakes were fluffy and the coffee was hot. Nothing fancy but reliable and affordable.
The grilled cheese was soggy and the tomato soup tasted canned. Disappointing even for diner standards.
Best milkshake in town! The BLT was loaded with crispy bacon. Friendly service and quick turnaround.
Decent diner food. The hot dog was standard fare but the onion rings were surprisingly good.
